Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.Model
      • models.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends com.avaje.ebean.Model
    Represents a transaction between a customer and an item
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dean Papastrat
